title: Education and School 2
sentences: Ich studiere seit zwei Jahren an der
I have been studying at the University of Cologne for two years.
Did you pass the difficult exam?
The professor explains the theory very well.
In the library one can study in peace.
I got a scholarship for my studies.
Would you like to eat in the canteen today?
The lecture begins a bit later today.
Which subject interests you the most?
I am learning German as a foreign language.
We are celebrating our graduation today.
Have you already received the certificate?
This semester I have many courses.
He possesses great knowledge in biology.
Können Sie mir diesen Satz bitte
Can you please explain this sentence to me?
Ich kann den Text leider nicht
Unfortunately, I cannot understand the text.
We have to repeat the vocabulary often.
ist sehr hilfreich für die Grammatik.
This exercise is very helpful for the grammar.
Unfortunately, I made a small mistake.
Can you please correct my homework?
The result of the exam was very good.
Science is looking for new solutions.
I have to give a short presentation tomorrow.
Soll ich in der Vorlesung für dich
Should I take notes for you in the lecture?
Ich bin sicher, dass Sie die Prüfung
I am sure that you will pass the exam.
In geography we learn a lot about countries.
I am very interested in history.
Today we have biology in the lab.
Your success in learning pleases me very much.
dictionary:
die Universität - university
die Prüfung - exam
der Professor - professor
die Bibliothek - library
das Stipendium - scholarship
die Mensa - canteen
die Vorlesung - lecture
das Fach - subject
die Fremdsprache - foreign language
der Abschluss - graduation / degree
das Zertifikat - certificate
das Semester - semester
das Wissen - knowledge
erklären - to explain
verstehen - to understand
wiederholen - to repeat
die Übung - exercise
der Fehler - mistake
korrigieren - to correct
das Ergebnis - result
die Wissenschaft - science
die Forschung - research
der Vortrag - presentation / talk
mitschreiben - to take notes
das Durchfallen - failing (an exam)
bestehen - to pass (an exam)
die Geographie - geography
die Geschichte - history
die Biologie - biology
der Erfolg - success
